decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and drawing 615/1B  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A visibility splay of 2.4 m X 2.4m shall be proveded on easch side of the access, the depth to be measured from the back edge of the footway and teh widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wal or other obstruction to visibiliity exceeding 600 mm in height above the surface of teh adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of the splays.

Condition : 4 - The development hereby permitted shall not be begun before the metered parking bay in Kingsley Avenue at the position of the proposed access has either ceased to become available for public use or has been modified to accommodate a vehicle crossover in the position approved.
description: Installation of a vehicular crossover to existing house
